snippet: The organizers staged their first major action outside the capital on Saturday, rallying about 1,500 people against alleged ballot fraud in the mayoral election of Astrakhan.
abstract: Organizers of Moscow’s huge antigovernment street protests stage a rare major action outside the capital, rallying about 1,500 people against suspected ballot fraud in Astrakhan’s mayoral election; it is a modest turnout, showing that the antigovernment forces are still fumbling for a way forward and are so far unable to surmount public indifference and light a fire for political reform
lead_paragraph: The organizers staged their first major action outside the capital on Saturday, rallying about 1,500 people against alleged ballot fraud in the mayoral election of Astrakhan.

headline.seo: Leaders of Rallies in Moscow Take Their Show on the Road
headline.main: Moscow Protesters Take Their Show on the Road
headline.print_headline: Moscow Protesters Take Their Show on the Road
